column4: Anyone: I've just apt-got irssi and bitlbee but for some obscur reasons, bitlbee whines about the config file not being proprely configured. Th emessage says configurations must be in [settings] section and that this is a syntax error. The config file is present, I chmodded it to 777 just to make sure even some random nobody could read it and yes, the section [setting] is there, thats the very first line (not commented out). I deleted te text a
thanks for letting me know about bitlbee, i'm checking this out, looks pretty cool
yeah it rocks to msn chat trough ssh from work ;)
